title: Victor Moses with bicycle
creator: Harriet's Photograph Collection, 1868-1996 (P HC)7
description: A man stands holding a bicycle with thin tires and curved handlebars. He has a mustache and wears a dark jacket, buttoned shirt, and trousers. His stance is straight and confident, and the bike rests lightly beside him, showing both hands on the handlebars in a simple studio-like setting.
subject: man; bicycle
rightsstatement: All items in Oregon Digital are defined in terms of copyright and/or licensing, but the specific definitions will vary from item to item. Because of these differences, Oregon Digital relies upon standards like Rights Statements and Creative Commons licensing to help researchers clearly understand ownership and use permissions.

His stance is straight and confident, and the bike rests lightly beside him, showing both hands on the handlebars in a simple studio-like setting.

title: Transportation to Fair - Woman on bicycle
creator: New York World's Fair (1939-1940 : New York, N.Y.)
description: A woman stands smiling beside her bicycle on a paved street. She wears a short sleeve blouse, a knee length skirt, and flat shoes. The bike has a basket on the front and a bag on the back. Behind her are flags, trees, and a large rounded building with tall windows.
subject: Transportation; Fair; Woman; bicycle
rightsstatement: The New York Public Library believes that this item is in the public domain under the laws of the United States, but did not make a determination as to its copyright status under the copyright laws of other countries. title: Sports - Bicycling - Man on bicycle
creator: New York World's Fair (1939-1940 : New York, N.Y.)
description: A man rides a bicycle at night wearing a long-sleeve athletic shirt that says “New York” and matching pants. He looks focused ahead as he pedals, and the dark background makes him and the bike stand out under the light.
subject: Sports; Bicycling; Man; bicycle

title: Group of Riders at Cycle Trades Field Day in Portland, Oregon
creator: Brown, Joseph Stephen, 1889-1960
description: This photo shows a group of young boys lined up with their bicycles, getting ready for what looks like a race or a group ride. They’re leaning forward on their bikes focused on something ahead of them. Most of them are wearing caps, button up shirts, and rolled up sleeves. In the background, you can see some tall trees, buildings, and people watching giving the scene a small town community feel. It looks like an outdoor event where kids gathered to take part in what could be a race.
subject: Group; Riders; Cycle; Trades; Field Day; Portland; Oregon
rightsstatement: The Oregon Historical Society believes that the item is in the Public Domain under the laws of the United States, but a determination has not been made as to the copyright status in other countries.

title: Students with Bicycles
description: Five men are sitting together in a grassy field with two bicycles behind them. They seem relaxed, some leaning back while others hold books or papers. The group is dressed neatly in shirts, jackets, and hats, and the trees in the background suggest they stopped to rest during a ride or picnic
subject: Students; Bicycles
